## Article Content

HOME
PAYMENTS
Payments

Our flexible payment options allow you to accept payments in multiple ways.

Online pre-payments & deposits: Collect deposits manually, with Express Booking™, or in online booking.

Front Desk Display or Direct Connection: Collect payments using a Front Desk Display or a card reader connected directly to an iPhone or iPad.

Client Self Checkout: Allow clients to check out using their phone.

The articles in this section cover how to manage payments with Mangomint, including how to collect deposits, set up your Front Desk Display, and more.

In this section:
Payment Basics
Payment Accounts
Payment Hardware
Credit Cards
Deposits
Cash Drawer
Using Non-Integrated Payment Processors
Advanced Settings: Payments & Checkout
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
